mapper.select: SELECT dep.id dept_id, dep.department_name dept_name, tab.pro_id, tab.pro_name, tab.year_id, tab.year_name, tab.class_id, tab.grade_class_name class_name FROM crim_department dep LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tab.*, gc.id class_id, gc.grade_class_name FROM ( SELECT pro.department_id, pro.id pro_id, pro.profession_name pro_name, ct.id year_id, ct.type_name year_name FROM crim_profession pro LEFT JOIN crim_type ct ON ct.pid = 5 WHERE pro.is_deleted = 0 AND ct.is_deleted = 0 ) tab LEFT JOIN crim_grade_class gc ON tab.pro_id = gc.profession_id AND tab.year_id = gc.year_level_id AND gc.is_deleted = 0 ) tab ON dep.id = tab.department_id WHERE dep.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY tab.year_name DESC, dep.id, tab.pro_id, tab.class_id
